reviewText: I understand that this course was created by Tokyo University, but since the title is "Studying at Japanese Universities" I expected to hear from students who attended other universities for their experiences.  Also, it was unclear from this the description of this course that it was expected that the enrollee go in depth into researching the majors at the universities and do some deep dive in them, or whether this was a very high level course for students and parents who just want to learn more.
Helpful if you know absolutely nothing but I think if you took the time to research you can learn all the same things on your own.
Many materials are now not available
Very useful and informative.
very interesting course .. gives you a good insight into student life in japan and the different programs to apply for.
excelent! I want even more ;) feedback provided by survey form. thank you.
I really liked it but the peer reviews tend to be rather unfair. Nevertheless is an amazing resource for those interested in pursuing formal education in Japan.

Great course, I was able to know a lot of information about how to prepare for the universities application program, some of this information was really difficult to find if don't know where to search, these course help me a lot.
Was expecting some basic Japanese.
It is an entry-level course for those who wants to study in Jp, the course give me the tools I need to dig deeper in the field.

The idea is brilliant to help applicants to go thru the addmissions process in Japanese universities. Explains the educational system of Japan pretty well. Universities from other countries should do smth similar, to introduce the educational system of a specific country to potential new applicants.However though, there are too many interviews from students, that are somewhat chaotic and the responses do not carry much information. I would rather prefer to have more of succinct information from the admissions staff.

The videos don't speak in depth or in specifics but make the thought of studying in Japan more accessible and enticing. The links and resources provided are hugely helpful and cover the the missing depth.

This course is the best for people who are interested in pursuing or continuing their tertiary education in Japan. I highly recommend to people who suited above seek to join this course as the course will give you a better understanding on Japanese university structure.

I find this course really helpfull, as it provides many resources. Also, it made me start planning ahead for my studies in Japan, which is essential. Also, I think having the advices of people that's living there in Japan, and had to go through the same process you will have to go was great. However, I expected the course to be a little more specific when explaining the process you have to follow to study in Japan, but I understand that it changes from one university to another one.
The materials are good. The forum is less active.
fun and interesting

This course offered a lot of different information to many other students looking abroad. It gave a lot of different scenarios and ways to deal with them. Also it offered many different experiences students in Japan were having, and that was very helpful. However the way it presented the course work information was a little hard to work with on my computer
ok
It was a great course and I benefit from it a lot.

This course provided great insight into what life is like as a student at a Japanese university. I liked that students were invited to speak and didn't gloss over some of the unattractive aspects of the application process because that has prepared me for what to expect. I will definitely consider studying in Japan and I am glad to have this course as a guide!
Very usefull due to the things that i was looking for, many usefull tips and a very good
thank you. .. i finished my adventure at studying at japanese universities...I am soo happy
E​xcellent Course
Nice course with detail explanation, I got a lot of information regarding study in Japan
very nice
N​ice
everything is explained

Si existen las ganas de ir a estudiar a Japón (sea lo que sea), este curso es totalmente recomendado. Otorga mucha información con detalle sobre los procesos asociados a la postulación a estudios en japón, y sobre el estilo de vida que se puede vivir. Te entrega un panorama completo de cómo es Japón, y así entonces puedas crear un "plan de acción".

I did not believe I would be able to study abroad in Japan before taking this course. After completing it, I feel I know all the necessary steps to make my dream a reality. The material provided is thorough and current. I highly recommend this course to anyone curious about studying abroad in Japan, even if you don't think you'll be applying to do so for years to come. The sooner you know what steps will be necessary, the better.
Fue bastante útil tanto en documentos como en el tema, un curso espectacular, muy bien organizado y practico, gracias por ser gratuito tanto el curso como las evaluaciones.
Este curso ha sido de gran ayuda en mi búsqueda de información sobre el proceso de admisión y la educación en universidades japonesas. Gracias.
Very instructive, with a lot of videos from students of U-Tokyo and different backgrounds and scholarships. An useful guide to achieve the title: Studying at Japanese Universities!
So good course

I am grateful for all the information shared and the tangible results of this course. I feel inspired, well informed and positive about going to Japan to continue my studies. Thank you to The University of Tokyo, professor Yaguchi and professor Itatsu, the students who shared their experiences and to coursera.org for making this possible. Stay safe and see you soon!
I have no definite words for how good this course was, the course talked about several useful aspects for those who want to study in Japan.

A very useful course to foreign students who intend to study in Japan. You'll find all information you need including ways to find and get into Japanese universities,  what scholarship grants to apply and how to live in Japan.
Very good course
in this time... i really needed this course...that was amazing.
I was really aiming for MEXT and it gives a better insight and courage to continue my studies in Masters and Ph.D.Thank you Coursera team and to the University of Tokyo!
Helpful, brief, informative. Highly recommend for those who want to get an introduction to studying in Japan.
good jpb
Even if I was looking for information about how to study in Japan many years ago I found very interesting opinions and sources to look for more information.

Very informative provides you with information to make your transition to Japan swift. It also provides you with the necessary tools to learn about the different opportunities you can have when studying in Japan. I would recommend this course to anyone that it is interested in studying overseas!
Excellent and very complete course. It has helped me and raised many doubts.
Very helpful if you know you'd like to study in Japan but don't know quite where to start. Some of the videos were awkward to watch but otherwise I enjoyed the course

To the ones who are planning to start, first 2 weeks are pretty important i think, other 2 weeks will be like having fun. But informations on these first 2 weeks are so valuable. Have fun! It's gonna make you learn what awaits you if you're planning to go to an university in Japan and it will make you serious about it!
Really helpful in every way possible. It gives a lot of material to study and investigate. It was really good. I 100% recomend it

Amazing course. I feel like it'd be of great help to keep reviewing this over and over again even though I finished it. It is highly motivating and detailed. Definitely recommend this to anyone seriously interested in studying in Japan.
learned a lot. Really looking forward for studying in japan.
It gave me the tools i needed to decide what to do with my academic future
It was a great time in learning about the Japanese university and it's program! Simply loved this course.
Excellent course with very useful and valuable information, knowledge and experiences.

A very complete course to prepare to study in Japan. Amazing and useful information, great reviews by students from overseas now studying in Japan, details about student life, Japanese culture, tuitions, scholarships etc.
this course is so useful for who wants to study in JP University
Fue muy informativo y de gran apoyo

This course is very helpful for those who are really considering studying abroad in Japan.It gvies you alot of information and tips regarding japanese universities and student life.It is very well presented and some useful links are also provided to help one plan their japanese education/stay.I would recommend it.
It was pretty clear and helpful.
If you consider studying in Japan, please enroll this course! They provide you enough materials (I mean PDFs) and videos!
A very useful course for those who want to know about Japanese Universities.

This course is very interesting because is possible to learn more about research student life who lives in Japan and others issues. I took the opportunity to talk about my dream in study in Japan and I could training my english skills to the first time. The materials helped me understand to about many points to scholarships of international students in Japan.
Very good course that gives us a head-on before applying for universities in Japan. Do give this course a try if you are interested in applying to Japan in the near future!
Really good course! It helped me a lot to know about the japanese universities, costs of living in Japan, scholarships and the students life there.

It was really good coarse. If you want to know the information about higher education in Japan then this is the best coarse available on the internet. I will highly recommend you to do this course if you are interested to do higher education in japan.

It was an excellent course, it allowed me to better understand the process, he gave invaluable advice to all those interested in studying in Japan and I consider it a great step for the process that I plan to implement in the future.
It's really useful.
A good option for those who are willing to study in Japan! You should try this course to get more information before applying to a Japanese University!

This course is very useful; I have got a very clear idea about studying at Japanese universities. I will apply for Research studies through the MEXT 2020-2021 scholarship and hope to find a place at Tokyo University.
Perfect!
The course was really interesting and I learned a lot of Japan. I am more passionated for studying in Japan
I love it this course is very helpful for me thank you for all information.
I want to say thanks to University of Tokyo. I think that I had my own directions to do my plan, sturying abroad in Japan.
excellent

This course has really helped me focus my research for scholarships and universities in Japan. It also provided some valuable insight into the application procedure and some really helpful student perspectives.
This course gave me a great opportunity to get acquainted with the most important requirements and procedures for applying to study in Japanese universities
Thank you so much for this great course

I want to take this opportunity to show my appreciation to Prof.Yujin Yaguchi, Prof.Yuko Itatsu, and all UTokyo students who helped to provide this essential and well-organized course. After the four sessions, I learned more about the Japanese university system, student lives in Tokyo, and I was able to choose the program that suits me better with a solid plan regarding the application prosses.
Really useful and enriching! It clearly describes the steps to take, gives you practical documents and talk about real student life in Japan through a lot of testimonies.
It was exactly what I was looking for. I got a much better idea of what I need to do in order to study in Japan.
So lucky to take a class of 'Studying at Japan

It's the perfect course for those who plan on studying in Japan in some point of their lives. Really recommend it!
This course has helped me a lot to understand how universities work in Japan, and how to find the most suitable.
Fantastic course to learn Japanese tradition and courses run by the Universities.
日本で勉強するのは楽になる！
very good course and made in really interesting way. I am glad that I did it.

A great course that gives me lots of information not just by documents but the experiences from students who are from University of Tokyo which impressed me and inspired me to be a great student like them.
This course was very helpful and insightful, it's really helped me think more about my future studies and broaden my horizons.

This course provides important information regarding studying in Japan. The most helpful part for me was where the international students share their experiences. It is very hard to find such first hand info online. Also the links to important e-docs such as JASSO website, MEXT scholarship info etc. makes it easy for an outsider to sort things out. I recommend every student who is considering Japan as their next destination to take this course.
It's really helpful to get to hear different students' stories.

Really great. The instructors are absolutely amazing.  The course truly gives out general, and extra information for future students or just students who are thinking about japan schooling. just over all cant complain about the course. Amazing 100%
best
It is very helpful for people think about studying in Japan. It helps for culture, lifestyle, food and how much life is cost. Thanks to all.
I did enjoy the course but the videos got a little tedious. It's great for those who are interested in studying in Japan
great course
The best! :)

It is a well designed course with short video clips interspersed with activities such as quizzes or reflections and action plans. There are several peer-reviews which help provide a wider variety of opinions. I highly recommend this course to anyone interested in Japan!

Really helpful. I'm serious about going to study at a Japanese University and this course was of great help. It has important information and the plus of the actual students' voices, which was amazing. Thanks to this course I have developed a plan and got nice sources for extra information.

I really enjoyed this course. It may not be specific in some areas, but it is definitely a good way to make the first step in making an action plan for studying in Japan. IT uses actual student accounts to give insight into what it is really like to live and study in Japan. You learn a great deal about the basics of studying and applying for Japanese Universities as an International student. The classes are also full of people from various places around the world. IT's wonderful.
